data.title: Elmbrook Schools
data.meta_description: The mission of the School District of Elmbrook is to educate and inspire every student, to think, to learn and to succeed.
data.text:
Brookfield East junior Jake Zheng was named the Future Business Leaders of America (FBLA) National Champion in Public Speaking!

Zheng competed against nine other finalists in the ‘Introduction to Public Speaking’ event and was declared the winner. Brookfield East freshman Parth Dharmadhikari also competed in the finalist round and finished seventh in the ‘Introduction to Financial Math’ competition.

Read Full Story about Brookfield East Student Named FBLA National Champion

Sam Slowik, a sophomore at Brookfield Central, has been making waves in the world of filmmaking with his stop-motion animated film Learning to Fly! His film won the Best Overall award at the Elmbrook 3-Minute Film Festival this past winter, and recently caught the attention of the Crossings International Film Festival, where it not only became a finalist but also earned him an Honorable Mention and a cash prize.

Read Full Story about BC Student’s Stop-Motion Animated Film Making Film Festival Rounds

The School District of Elmbrook’s Board of Education confirmed the administration’s recommendation of Bryan Groshek and Chad Whalley as Associate Principals of Brookfield Central High School at its regular board meeting on Monday, July 8.

Read Full Story about Bryan Groshek & Chad Whalley Named Brookfield Central APs

Read Full Story about Eduspeak Podcast: The Elmbrook Promise (ft. Dr. Amie Farley)

Read more for additional information.

Read Full Story about Elmbrook School Board Lists Hillside Elementary Property for Sale

On June 18, the Elmbrook Board of Education approved the administration’s recommendation of Ben Prather as the new Assistant Superintendent for Business Services. This approval completes the restructure of Senior Leadership positions following Assistant Superintendent’s Kristin Sobocinski’s departure. In response to the complexity and demands of the Assistant Superintendent for Business Services role, two leadership positions were created; one filled by Human Resources Director Pam Casey as the new Assistant Superintendent for Human Resources, and the other by Ben Prather in Business Services (Finance, Facilities and Food Service).

Read Full Story about Board Approves New Senior Leadership Changes

Brookfield Central student Aidan Liu (‘26) has been named to the 2024-2025 US National Development Team! Being named to the national development team is the highest honor that a junior speedskater can receive from a developmental perspective by the National Sports Governing Body under U.S. Olympic Committee!

Read Full Story about BC Student Aidan Liu Named to Short Track National Development Team

Several Elmbrook students received recognition for their work from the 2024 National Center for Women and Information Technology (NCWIT) association for their aspirations in computing.

Read Full Story about Elmbrook Students Receive 2024 NCWIT Honors
